|07:35|![](https://avatars.slack-edge.com/2018-04-27/354445776386_e258f5ed5ba887b08668_72.jpg)|shinyu|Chrome (Chromium) 128 （明日がリリース予定日）で、Vivliostyleがまともに使えなくなる問題があることが分かり、それに対応するVivliostyle.js修正版を作ってます。この修正を入れてからVivliostyle.jsとVivliostyle CLIの新バージョンをリリースします。<br><https://github.com/vivliostyle/vivliostyle.js/issues/1370><br><blockquote>Vivliostyle.js has problem with Chrome (Chromium) 128. Viewer page display size is abnormally reduced and layout is broken.<br><br>Test with Chrome 128:  <br><https://vivliostyle.org/viewer/#src=https://raw.githack.com/vivliostyle/vivliostyle.js/master/packages/core/test/files/leader/toc-leader.html|https://vivliostyle.org/viewer/#src=https://raw.githack.com/vivliostyle/vivliostyle.js/master/packages/core/test/files/leader/toc-leader.html><br><br>Screenshot:  <br><https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/3324737/358953258-ead48139-2c5f-482e-9475-f1fab9b04abe.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..tiEdM-Myh6-cXdEVmEKCAku9CbQW7mXc0usGzm1SOw0|Screenshot 2024-08-19 10 12 22><br><br>Expected result (with Chrome 127):  <br><https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/3324737/358953592-5a7bf499-f342-49fe-8aa7-78d76744f5d6.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..qjYHK7LW77pp4TJh41IqUJivatYQOX6GysC6Gu_LOhg|Screenshot 2024-08-19 10 33 46><br><br>This issue is caused by the fix of the CSS zoom implementation in Chromium.
